snippet.title: A Fold Apart Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Based on a true story, A Fold Apart is a puzzle game about a long-distance relationship -- in a world of folding paper! 💙

Inspired by origami and papercraft, A Fold Apart's award-winning game mechanic allows players to fold and manipulate the paper world to navigate the emotional struggles that arise from being apart from a loved one.

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/451310/A_Fold_Apart/

Sign up to get updates on A Fold Apart first: http://eepurl.com/dfgrjv
